text: The organisation team was awesome. worth it every penny spent! Special thanks to the chair, NATO. Taught us so many things in such a short span of time. Was a first timer in MUN but i am confident enough to participate more in next MUN. Thank you.
Nothing much for a feedback, everything went absolutely great and i personally had a LOT of fun and I'm looking forward for more conferences.
